title: Huiskamerrestaurant Pluimes
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Dutch
description: Vegetarian "living room restaurant" that opens for dinner twice a month only - check website for the calendar. Dinner is a three-course menu based on organic or bio-dynamic fresh ingredients mostly sourced from the region. Reservations are required. Need to indicate any dietary preferences if any.
